subject: Re: Fw: Fw: Eptec External Web Page - Policy

full_threads.body: Closing this ticket since this is a new request. See. the updated link here: https://secure.helpscout.net/conversation/3158061291/180275?viewId=8874269

Tertius de Vries ​​​​ General Manager HSSEQ Eptec Group | Head Office Level 2, 68 Waterloo Road , Macquarie Park , NSW , 2113 | Australia M: 0423 301 450 E: tdevries@eptec.com.au | W: www.eptec.com.au Defence and Infrastructure, Asset Remediation & Corrosion Mitigation Solutions This email, including any attachments, is confidential and may be legally privileged (and neither is waived or lost by mistaken delivery). Please notify us if you have received this email in error and promptly delete it from your system. Any unauthorised use of this email is expressly prohibited. Our liability in connection with this email (including due to viruses in any attachments) is limited to re-supplying this email and its attachments. Good morning, Joy, Glad to inform you that Fransie is back on deck and will manage this initiative to ensure we get the webpage finalised and published. Can you please activate her access to the page to enable her to coordinate, review and comment as required. As per prior e-mails, I am confirming that the HSEQ pages are looking great and I would like for it to be published as discussed please. Proposing we add it as a title on the main page with a drop down as follow: HSEQ
  • Policies
  • Zero Harm System
  • Environmental, Social & Governance
  • Certifications
  • Zero Harm Journey
Mark, Please provide the new ISO 19443 certificate to be uploaded. Stay safe!

This ticket will now be closed as the Policies page updates are complete.

A new ticket will be created to track the client’s separate request regarding the addition of the ISO 19443 certificate to the Certifications page.

View Ticket Link Here:  https://secure.helpscout.net/conversation/3155418854/179954?viewId=8874269

Ticket Issue / Note:
The client requested updates to the Policies page on the Eptec website.

Updates Completed:
  • Replaced the old PDFs with the updated versions provided by Mark Dawson.
  • Linked each PDF to its corresponding button on the Policies page.
    Policies updated:
    • POL-001 – WHS Policy
    • POL-002 – Respectful Workplace Policy
    • POL-003 – Privacy Policy
    • POL-006 – Diversity and Inclusion Policy
    • POL-013 – Quality Policy
    • POL-016 – Environmental Sustainability Policy
    • POL-018 – Whistleblower Policy
    • POL-022 – Cookie Policy
    • POL-024 – Modern Slavery Policy
      New policy added:
    • POL-023 – Privacy Notice for Personnel Privacy

  • All updates have been QA’d and the draft page was shared with Mark Dawson for review: Draft Policies Page Link
  • Mark has confirmed that the Policies page looks good.

Hi Marcelo,

The policies look good on the link you sent through

Is it possible to add in the attached "ISO 19443 - Nuclear Quality Management" certificate to our certifications page?

Mark Dawson

The policy PDFs on the Eptec Policies page have been updated and properly linked to their corresponding buttons. The design and layout of the updated page have been QA’d by @Joy.

  • We have followed up with Mark Dawson regarding confirmation of the updates.
  • We are currently waiting for his approval to push the changes live.
  • We will continue to monitor for any feedback to ensure the updates go live smoothly.

Closing this ticket for now and will be reopened or updated once we receive further reply.

Hi Mark,

I just wanted to follow up to let you know that the updates we shared earlier have now been fully implemented on your website draft. All policy PDFs are linked to the corresponding buttons on your Policies page.

You can review them here: https://eptec.com.au/about/policies-2/

Once you’ve had a chance to confirm that everything is displaying correctly, we’ll go ahead and push these updates live on your website.

Please let us know if you notice anything that needs adjusting.

Hi Mark,

I hope you’re doing well!

I’m reaching out as I’m filling in for Joy and wanted to let you know that the policy PDFs on your website have been updated and are now live. Here’s a summary of the changes for your reference:

View the draft page here: https://eptec.com.au/about/policies-2/

Updated and Added Policies (Linked to Existing Buttons – 9 Files):
  • POL-001 – WHS Policy (Linked to: WHS Policy button)
  • POL-002 – Respectful Workplace Policy (Linked to: Respectful Workplace Policy button)
  • POL-003 – Privacy Policy (Linked to: Privacy Policy button)
  • POL-006 – Diversity and Inclusion Policy (Linked to: Diversity & Inclusion Policy button)
  • POL-013 – Quality Policy (Linked to: Group Quality Policy button)
  • POL-016 – Environmental Sustainability Policy (Linked to: Group Environmental Policy button)
  • POL-018 – Whistleblower Policy (Linked to: Whistleblower Policy button)
  • POL-022 – Cookie Policy (Linked to: Cookies button)
  • POL-024 – Modern Slavery Policy (Linked to: Modern Slavery Statement button)

New Policy Added (New Button – 1 File):
  • POL-023 – Privacy Notice for Personnel Privacy

All documents have been properly linked to the corresponding buttons on your Policies page. Once you’ve had a chance to review and confirm that everything is displaying correctly, we will proceed to push these updates live on your website.

If you notice anything that needs further adjustment, or if there’s anything else we can assist with, don’t hesitate to reach out.

full_threads.body:
Hi Support Team,

Need a quick hand with this ticket, please.

  • Link: https://eptec.com.au/about/policies-2/
  • The Task: Swap out the old PDFs for the new ones (attached as a zip file).
  • Reference: Please see the screenshot below for a guide on where they go.

Let me know if you have any questions.

Thanks,
Joy
**

Hi Mark,

Thanks for sending through the updated policies.

We'll get those PDFs updated for you and let you know as soon as it's all sorted.

Hi,

Pleas find attached updated policies for inclusion

Thanks,

MD

Mark Dawson

full_threads.body:
Hi Tertius,

Appreciate the update.

We will stand by for the new policies. As soon as we receive them, we'll make sure the pages are updated accordingly.

Good morning, Joy,

My apologies for the delayed response, was traveling and rolling out leadership training.

The HSEQ pages are great, thank you! We only need to fix policies and then we can publish the completed pages.

Please note that Des is no longer working at Eptec and I have requested Mark Dawson (copied) to coordinate the review, with Chris, Tim and myself providing input.

Mark can you please provide Joy with new policies signed by Manikam to link to the page?

Kind regards,

Tertius de Vries

Hi Tertius,

Hope you are doing well!

We've sent the update to Des in a different ticket last month of October. At the moment, we are waiting for their feedback.

Here are the details:

We've completed the updates below:

  1. Changes to existing pages (duplicated for your review — not yet live until approved)
    1. Certifications
    2. Policies
  2. New HSSEQ pages:
    1. Zero Harm Journey
    2. Zero Harm System
    3. Environmental, Social & Governance

Please take a moment to review the updates and share any feedback or approval once you are available.

Good morning,

Can you please advise on the status of the HSEQ website and related sections/pages.

Kind regards,

Tertius
